name: HEX:DECODE
description: Decodes an input hexadecimal string into a byte array.

input.name: hexString
input.description: The input hexadecimal string to be decoded.

output.name: byteArray
output.description: The resulting byte array after decoding the input hexadecimal string.

examples.description: Decodes the hexadecimal string '48656c6c6f' into its corresponding byte array.

name: HEX:ENCODE
description: Encodes a byte array into a hexadecimal string.

input.name: byteArray
input.description: The input byte array to be encoded.

output.name: hexString
output.description: The resulting hexadecimal string after encoding the input byte array.

examples.description: Encodes the input byte array, such as [72, 101, 108, 108, 111], into its corresponding hexadecimal string '48656c6c6f'.
